enisama siya depilama ada kolambaa thuranga tharaga pitiyata piwisenne kirula rakaganime balaporoththuwenuyi.rusiyawe moskaw nuwara di pasugiya masaye pawathi loka kusalana sath samajika ragar tharagawaliye awasan purwa watayata piwisi kenyanu kandayamata krida kala prabala kridakayan 5kma jafna chalenjars pila niyojanaya kirima owunge balaporoththu ihala damimata wadagath sadhakayak.galu tharagawaliye awasan tharagaye di jafna chalenjars pila lakunu 22 -17 kin north westarn blaks kandayama parajaya kala athara ehi di jafna chalenjars pila wartha kala uthsahayaka dinum 4ma ras kale kenyanu kridakayan wima kapi penuna.galle pawathi tharagawaliye di thunwani thanata pathwunu north sentral tayipuns kandayamath, siwuwani thana dinagath nodarn gladiyetars kandayamath ada sesu kandayam abhibawa yamata dadi uthsahayak ganiwi.sath samajika ragar tharaga bime prabalathama deshiya kridakayan wagema fiji kridakayan 5k da north sentral tayipuns kandayamata athulath wenawa.palamu adiyare tharagawaliye palamu dinaye di peramuna gath eestarn eegals, westarn woriyars ha nodarn gladiyetars kandayam dewani dinaye di pasubamakata lakwuwath ada pawathwena tharagawala di supurudu daskam dakwimata uthsaha karanu nisakayi.palamu adiyare di eestarn eegals kandayamata erehiwa lakunu 42 -7ka jayak wartha kala sentral kings kandayama tharagawaliye 9wani sthanaya athkara gaththa.
